ygData.subject: Re: Clay Dieties
ygData.msgSnippet: Well Met Lannella Lots of us Mud Slingers are hanging out at the Trader s Corner www.eqtraders.com There is a 3rd Wisdom Diety made from the Sands of Ro.
ygData.messageBody:
Well Met Lannella

Lots of us Mud Slingers are hanging out at the Trader's Corner
www.eqtraders.com

There is a 3rd Wisdom Diety made from the Sands of Ro.

Currently /Bugged since it does fit in Off-Hand, but not the
Ranged weapons slot as well excludes Shamans.

> Btw now that you can buy vials from merchants

Curious: Backstabbing Babe
Have you stopped by www.thesafehouse.org yet?

Niami has Poison Vendors on her site as well.
I usually make my own vials, but Toxdilla in West Freeport tunnels.
Head right out of the West Gate to the hidden wall.

And another vendor out in West Karana close to the North Karana borders.

Even if you haven't hit your 20th season... you COULD be
making poisions right now. My Bar Wench on Morrell-Thule is
still too young to apply her toxins, but has disproved the notion
that she had to wait until her 20th to use a Mortar & Pestal to
make spider and snake poisons!

EverFaithful
Cleric Taven
